name: CF.Bomb0
description:
Custom character "Bomb0". 
Resin casted figure, hand made, hand painted. 

Limited to 1 piece by color.
- Turquoise/Blue
- Light Grey/Pink
- Black/White
- Black/Toxic
- Brown/Orange

Size: 5' - 13cm 
Weight: 400gr
Year: 2013

Content: Custom box, authentification certificate, 
stickers, accessories.


------------------------------------------------------------------


For more figure pictures, please visit: 
http://extended-graphix.blogspot.com 
where you will find a dedicated page about my resins.

*Note: Each one is unique and hand made. They will possibly have some small imperfections and slight color variations. 
The figure will come in small custom box packaged inside a shipping box, with protection between. 
There is 5 colors listed for purchase, each one limited to 2 pieces. 
The products are not children’s toys, they are suitable for age 15 and older.

name: C.m.Bomb . print#1
description:
Here is C.m.Bomb. A neo-futurist character presented at the last "On Steitch" collective show.

"Made out of steel and air, he live on the Planet of BW016(banned writers) for several years. 
This planet, far from our solar system, was colonized by the world government to deport hard writers from the Earth's walls during the 70's.
When wall writers arrive on this planet, they have a lobotomy, they are robotized, and are left legless; with this aim in view to avoid rebelion, disorder and bulging walls like on Planet Earth. 
C.m. Bomb was allocated to the post of smart bomb controller. He is supposed to destroy any tempting wall for all new writers who don't have a "proper" brain yet. He hope one day, to go back on Earth where writers are now considered as artists. 
A thursday night, a few month ago, he escaped from his function. Since this day, we only know that he try to find out some paint spray; we believe that his lobotomy was'nt a success. 
Nobody was able to catch him and bring him back for the reward price. 

The march is on, C.m.Bomb is on." 



- Print on pearled pvc paper.
- 25*35 cm.
- Limited to 10 pcs.

Specify if you want it framed.
